content: The constructor syntax is close to the method syntax. However, the constructor has the same name as the name of the class (with the same case) and the constructor has no return type. The second point is the most important difference as a method can also have the same name as the class, which is not recommended:
stemmed: the constructor syntax close method syntax . howev , constructor name name class ( case ) constructor return type . the second point import differ method also name class , recommend :
